Rank.Description: Increases the maximum stack size of your Searing Vitality buff by 1.
Increases the maximum stack size of your Searing Vitality buff by 2.
Increases the radius of your Archon buff auras by 5 meters and reduces their cast time by 33%.
Increases the radius of your Archon buff auras by 10 meters and reduces their cast time by 66%.
Increases the radius of your Archon buff auras by 15 meters and reduces their cast time by 100%.
Increases your damage by 1%.
Increases your damage by 2%.
Increases your damage by 3%.
Increases your damage by 4%.
Increases your damage by 5%.
Your spell critical hits return 0.25% of your maximum Mana.
Your spell critical hits return 0.5% of your maximum Mana.
Your spell critical hits return 0.75% of your maximum Mana.
Your spell critical hits return 1% of your maximum Mana.
Your spell critical hits return 1.25% of your maximum Mana.

Pillaging Stone places a stacking buff on you, increasing your Strength, Dexterity, Wisdom and Intelligence by an amount equal to 8% of the amount debuffed on the enemy. Max 5 stacks. Increases the Strength, Dexterity, Intelligence and Wisdom bonuses your allies gain from your Vitality of Stone by 10%.

Pillaging Stone places a stacking buff on you, increasing your Strength, Dexterity, Wisdom and Intelligence by an amount equal to 16% of the amount debuffed on the enemy. Max 5 stacks. Increases the Strength, Dexterity, Intelligence and Wisdom bonuses your allies gain from your Vitality of Stone by 20%.

Pillaging Stone places a stacking buff on you, increasing your Strength, Dexterity, Wisdom and Intelligence by an amount equal to 24% of the amount debuffed on the enemy. Max 5 stacks. Increases the Strength, Dexterity, Intelligence and Wisdom bonuses your allies gain from your Vitality of Stone by 30%.

Ability.Description: Reduces movement speed by 30%. Increases the Mage's movement speed by 50% for 15s. Removes all movement impairing effects.

Rank.Description: Flowing Sand
Reduces the mana cost of your abilities by 3% for each Archon aura you have active.
Reduces the mana cost of your abilities by 6% for each Archon aura you have active.

Ability.Description: Deals Fire damage equal to 10% of the Mage's Maximum Mana over 8s. Returns 10% of the Mage's mana over 8s.

Rank.Description: Leeching Flames
Increases the damage done by all of your Archon damaging abilities by 4% and all other abilities by 2%.
Increases the damage done by all of your Archon damaging abilities by 8% and all other abilities by 4%.
Increases the damage done by all of your Archon damaging abilities by 12% and all other abilities by 6%.
Increases the damage done by all of your Archon damaging abilities by 16% and all other abilities by 8%.
Increases the damage done by all of your Archon damaging abilities by 20% and all other abilities by 10%.
Reduces the cast time of your spells by 2% for each Archon aura you have active.
Reduces the cast time of your spells by 4% for each Archon aura you have active.
Increases the resistance bonus provided to you from your Crumbling Resistance by 10%. Crumbling Resistance also increases your damage by 2%.
Increases the resistance bonus provided to you from your Crumbling Resistance by 20%. Crumbling Resistance also increases your damage by 4%.
Increases the resistance bonus provided to you from your Crumbling Resistance by 30%. Crumbling Resistance also increases your damage by 6%.

Ability.Description: Deals 1047 Fire damage over 6s to up to 10 enemies in the target area. Up to 10 party or raid members in the area have their damage increased by 5%.
Restores 30% of the Mage's mana over 10s.

Rank.Description: Mental Flare
Increases the critical hit chance of your spells by 1%.
Increases the critical hit chance of your spells by 2%.
Increases the critical hit chance of your spells by 3%.
Increases the critical hit chance of your spells by 4%.
Increases the critical hit chance of your spells by 5%.
Increases the damage bonus allies gain from Lava Field by 5%.
Increases the damage bonus allies gain from Lava Field by 10%.
Reduces the cooldown on Flowing Sand by 5 seconds.
Reduces the cooldown on Flowing Sand by 10 seconds.
Increases your damage and healing by 3% for each Archon aura you have active.
Increases your damage and healing by 6% for each Archon aura you have active.

Ability.Description: Deals 1654 to 1829 Earth damage. Increases Physical Crit and Spell Crit by 3% for 30s on all party and raid members.

Rank.Description: Earthen Barrage

Ability.Description: Reduces Attack Power and Spell Power by 5%. Increases the Mage's Spell Power by 10% for 15s.

Rank.Description: Waning Power
Your Cleansing Flames spell removes 1 buff from up to 10 enemies within the targeted area.
Reduces the damage you take by 2% for each Archon aura you have active.
Reduces the damage you take by 4% for each Archon aura you have active.
Your non-Physical attacks ignore 3% of your target's Resistances.
Your non-Physical attacks ignore 6% of your target's Resistances.
Your non-Physical attacks ignore 10% of your target's Resistances.
Reduces the global cooldown of your Archon Auras to 1 second.
Increases the Critical Strike bonus from your Earthen Barrage by 1%.
Increases the Critical Strike bonus from your Earthen Barrage by 2%.
Increases your Spell Power by 4%.
Increases your Spell Power by 8%.
Increases your Spell Power by 12%.

Places a totem at both the targeted ally's location and the Mage's location. Group and raid members near each totem gain a temporary ability allowing them to teleport to the opposing totem's location. Totems last 5m.
